title: The painful search for loved ones detained by Islamic State
text:
The painful search for loved ones detained by Islamic State 5:21am GMT - 02:26 
Thousands of people that were detained by Islamic State remain missing, and their loved ones are demanding answers about where they've gone now the militant group has collapsed. Reuters Emily Wither reports from Istanbul.   
Thousands of people that were detained by Islamic State remain missing, and their loved ones are demanding answers about where they've gone now the militant group has collapsed. Reuters Emily Wither reports from Istanbul.  //reut.rs/2B454d3
